VAR.name: defaultLocale
VAR.desc: default locale for site

VAR.name: useClientLocale
VAR.desc: when true, SiteManager will default to the locale requested by the clients browser, if available

VAR.name: active
VAR.desc: whether this connection is active or not

VAR.name: defaultConnection
VAR.desc: set to true to have this connection be the default connection. will be $dbH

VAR.name: dbType
VAR.desc: the database type. must be valid PEAR database type.

VAR.name: persistent
VAR.desc: bool to determine whether this is a persistent connection or not

VAR.name: required
VAR.desc: if this is true, a fatal error will be thrown if the connection fails. if false, it will ignore a bad connection.

VAR.name: 2.2.x
VAR.desc: set to true if you want more compatibility with SiteManager 2.2.x

VAR.name: allowQuickTags
VAR.desc: if true, the template engine will use the Quick Tag system

VAR.name: quickTagIdentifier
VAR.desc: Quick Tags will be wrapped in this identifier

VAR.name: showLoadTime
VAR.desc: when true, all pages will have an HTML comment tacked onto them with the page's load time

VAR.name: propagateInVarDefault
VAR.desc: if this is true, inVars will be propagated by default. when false, you must specify which to propagate

VAR.name: sendNoCacheHeaders
VAR.desc: if this is true, a header will be sent to stop browsers from caching pages

VAR.name: useCache
VAR.desc: master switch for using the caching system

VAR.name: cacheSMConfig
VAR.desc: (deprecate) when true, SiteManager will attempt to cache SMCONFIG files to the cache directory

VAR.name: cacheSMLanguage
VAR.desc: (deprecate) when true, SiteManager will attempt to cache SMLANGUAGE files to the cache directory

VAR.name: cacheSMObject
VAR.desc: (deprecate) when true, SiteManager will attempt to cache SMOBJECT files to the cache directory

VAR.name: cacheSmartForm
VAR.desc: (deprecate) when true, SiteManager will attempt to cache SMARTFORM files to the cache directory

VAR.name: useCache
VAR.desc: cache this file type

VAR.name: autoExpire
VAR.desc: if true, the file will auto-recache if the file change time is later than the cache file change time

VAR.name: cacheTTL
VAR.desc: maximum length of time (in seconds) before a file should be recached

VAR.name: debugLevel
VAR.desc: debugLog messages of this verbosity and lower will be shown in the debugLog - all else ommitted.

VAR.name: errorHandler
VAR.desc: default SiteManager error handler (class name). To customize for a site, extend SM_errorHandler and place an entry in your localConfig.xsm

VAR.name: showNotices
VAR.desc: when true, SiteManager will display all PHP notices and warnings in the debug output

VAR.name: develState
VAR.desc: whether sitemanager is in development mode or not

VAR.name: debugOnVar
VAR.desc: if true, the debugLog will be shown above the output of a page if variable SM_debug is passed as 1 to the script

VAR.name: containerType
VAR.desc: which session container to use. currently 'database' or 'file'

VAR.name: sessionCookie
VAR.desc: when non blank, create a cookie on the remote users machine that stores their session id

VAR.name: useMemberSystem
VAR.desc: main on/off switch for member system. if on, make sure 'members' section is setup

VAR.name: forceSessionID
VAR.desc: when set to true, the session ID variable will always be appended to links, even if a cookie is in use. true is safest bet, as users can turn cookies off.

VAR.name: autoLogin
VAR.desc: when true, if a session cookie was found, try to restore their session

VAR.name: badSessionPage
VAR.desc: page to send to when a session is invalid

VAR.name: scriptWithVars
VAR.desc: regex to determine if linking to a script. if you use a different extension other than .php, change this

VAR.name: sessionIDName
VAR.desc: variable name to use to store sessions ID

VAR.name: cookieTTL
VAR.desc: session cookie expire time. 2678400=1month. set to 0 to expire after browser closes.

VAR.name: defaultScript
VAR.desc: the default script that loads when no script is specified

VAR.name: cookiePath
VAR.desc: the path setcookie() will use for the session cookie

VAR.name: forceAntiCacheVar
VAR.desc: when set to a value, SiteManager sessions will add this variable with a random value to the URL in an attempt to thwarte caching systems

VAR.name: absoluteLinkBase
VAR.desc: when set, it will be prepended to all session generated links. use for making links absolute.

VAR.name: trackLastPageAccess
VAR.desc: When set, we track the last page access time was for each user. if inactiveTTL is greater then 0, it will log the person (see 'inactiveTTL' in the members section)

VAR.name: serialize
VAR.desc: whether to serialize all persistent variables or not. must be true to keep arrays and objects perisistent

VAR.name: dataBaseID
VAR.desc: which database connection (from db section) should SiteManager use for sessions

VAR.name: sessionTable
VAR.desc: sessions table name

VAR.name: hashFunc
VAR.desc: crc32 or md5 for computing hash of session key. crc32 is faster, md5 will produce a more unique key

VAR.name: savePath
VAR.desc: path to save session files. must be writable by web server!

VAR.name: memberSystemType
VAR.desc: which member system handler to use

VAR.name: usePersistentMembers
VAR.desc: when true, member data will be keep as a persistent variable instead of loaded in from the container each time

VAR.name: loginTTL
VAR.desc: how long is a login session valid for (2678400)

VAR.name: inactiveTTL
VAR.desc: Number of seconds of inactivity before session times out. 1800 default (30 mins) trackLastPageAccess in sessions must bet 'true' for this to work

VAR.name: maintainTables
VAR.desc: if true, SiteManager will delete old sessions. performance hit, so defaults to false. better to run a cron'd script.

VAR.name: dataBaseID
VAR.desc: which database connection (from db section) should SiteManager use for sessions

VAR.name: memberTable
VAR.desc: member table name

VAR.name: memberSessionsTable
VAR.desc: logged in member session table

VAR.name: userNameField
VAR.desc: the username field

VAR.name: passWordField
VAR.desc: the password field

VAR.name: uIDField
VAR.desc: the unique user id field

VAR.name: sIDField
VAR.desc: the unique session id field

VAR.name: dcField
VAR.desc: DATETIME field of session creation
